[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin](./react-rsbuild-plugin.md) &gt; [AddComponentElementConfig](./react-rsbuild-plugin.addcomponentelementconfig.md) &gt; [compilerOnly](./react-rsbuild-plugin.addcomponentelementconfig.compileronly.md)

## AddComponentElementConfig.compilerOnly property

Whether to only add component element during compilation

**Signature:**

```typescript
compilerOnly: boolean
```

## Example

Note that this only take effects on `Component` imported from [CompatVisitorConfig.oldRuntimePkg](./react-rsbuild-plugin.compatvisitorconfig.oldruntimepkg.md)<!-- -->.

```js
import { defineConfig } from '@lynx-js/rspeedy'
import { pluginReactLynx } from '@lynx-js/react-rsbuild-plugin'

export default defineConfig({
  plugins: [
    pluginReactLynx({
      compat: {
        addComponentElement: { compilerOnly: true }
      },
    })
  ],
})
```
